divs: sighting detailsabout 20 years ago, in 1993, i saw a metal sphere 1 m in diameter, about 120m away and 30m high. it was a metallic color, a little orange. i recently learned that titanium oxide gets a light golden color. i think this data will be useful, in case anyone else has a similar report, and consider whether these types of ufo type sphere, are made of titaneo. this was the mexico df in colonia del valle, at noon, the direction was at north of my window, it was moving slowly around 4m\seg, from west to east, i saw him for about 7 sec.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Mexico
There were no other sightings in Mexico on or around March 1st 1993
Summary: metal sphere 1m in diameter color of titanio
